content: in this legal case the court of appeal in ancona made a final ruling on a partition case involving osba bael and ra the court determined that two real estate portions can be divided and assigned a value to certain assets they also divided the shareholding of ro srl among the three heirs the court considered the italian civil code and civil procedure code in making their decision the case involved the division of various assets including properties company shares and valuable furniture the court addressed objections and appeals regarding the valuation of corporate shareholdings and the composition of the lots ultimately rejecting them and ordering the implementation of the division plan they also discussed the sale of a villa and emphasized the need for an equitable distribution of assets among the heirs the court ordered the preparation of a supplementary expert report to address any remaining issues and concluded by addressing the costs of the proceedings in a separate ruling by the court of macerata they declared that two real estate portions can be divided determined the value of certain assets divided the shareholding of ro srl among the heirs and ordered a separate determination of the value of individual lots the final judgment was made on september 28 2021 and filed with the court registry on july 20 2022
